Author: anrecovery
Text: i feel that, it’s not like physical hunger sometimes it’s just like i just keep wanting the taste of food and feeling it go into my body, it’s weird. i’ll look in the mirror at how huge my stomach is from all the food and still go back to get more, it makes no sense, it’s like an addiction to keep getting up and getting more food.   try to take it easy on yourself, try to recognize what’s going on and hear your try voice shining through letting you know when you’re actually hungry and not. sometimes it does just take being uncomfortable, which sucks, but overall if you listen to your real voice enough times the hope is that THAT will become your new habit
